home_desc: CROWNY integrates and manages businesses across 153 countries on a single platform, supporting growth in 5 core industries: Finance, Bio, Energy, Goods, and Aid.
home_industriesDesc: Pursuing sustainable growth in each industry sector
home_coinDesc: The reserve currency of the CROWNY network
home_polygonDesc: Operates on the Polygon network with fast and low-cost transactions
home_walletDesc: Securely store CROWNA and use it for business through a dedicated wallet
home_valueDesc: CROWNY directly manages holdings and circulation without coin burning to maintain stable value
home_coinNote: Starting with centralized operation · Exclusively for CROWNY network business · Internal activation until reaching from KRW 25,500 to KRW 153,000
home_ctaTitle: We Are Looking for Partners to Grow With
home_ctaDesc: Investors, entrepreneurs, and professionals — start your journey with CROWNY
about_heroDesc: A global business ecosystem connecting 153 countries
about_missionTitle:
Connecting businesses worldwide
to achieve shared prosperity
about_missionDesc: CROWNY consolidates the industrial capabilities of each country and builds a cross-border business network, providing a platform where all participants can grow together.
about_visionDesc: Our vision is to nurture 153 enterprises in each country across the 5 core industries — Finance, Bio, Energy, Goods, and Aid — and create KRW 153 billion in value per enterprise.
about_coreValuesDesc: Every decision at CROWNY is grounded in these values
about_transparencyDesc: All capital flows and business status are disclosed in real time with full transparency.
about_sustainabilityDesc: We pursue long-term value creation and social impact rather than short-term profits.
about_globalCoopDesc: We maximize synergy by combining each country's strengths beyond borders.
about_tokenEconomyDesc: An internal economic system based on CROWNA coin
about_coinFeature1: Total supply of {amount}, based on the Polygon network
about_coinFeature2: Starting with centralized operation, dedicated CROWNY wallet provided
about_coinFeature3: Exclusive payment method for CROWNY network businesses
about_coinFeature4: Value managed through holdings and circulation without coin burning
about_priceNote: Average value growth target of 7%+ · Internal service activation until reaching KRW 153,000
about_roadmapDesc: Expanding the global network in phases
about_phase1Desc: Platform validation with 1 country (Korea) and 5 enterprises
about_phase2Desc: Expanding to 5 Asian countries including Japan and Vietnam
about_phase3Desc: Entering major European and North American markets with advanced investment systems
about_phase4Desc: Reaching 100 countries including Africa and South America
about_phase5Desc: Completion of the 153-country global network and establishment of an autonomous operating system
about_orgDesc: Efficient global operations through a 7-tier role system
about_ctaDesc: Setting a new standard for global business
dash_desc: View the CROWNY platform status at a glance
ent_noEnterprise: No enterprises are registered in this industry
login_desc: Log in with your CROWNY account
login_fillAll: Please enter your email and password.
tv_heroSubtitle: Beyond expertise, people who prove their value
tv_matthewDesc: Professional interview show on technology, finance, and business
tv_matthewNote: Maintaining professional image · Outlier content · Engagement increases after 7+ episodes
tv_benefitsDesc: The value CROWNY TV will create
tv_benefit1Desc: Evolving beyond a simple channel to become a full-fledged media house
tv_benefit2Desc: Converged revenue from manufacturing (InterM), beauty (CROWNY), content (YouTube), and finance
tv_benefit3Desc: Building a global belt spanning from Silicon Valley to developing nations
tv_rewardsNote: Until September 30, 2027 · Target of 7 episodes per project
